author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: A follow-up to r22369, accumulating
merge info (which may be broken over multiple lines) in a
(end_element): Update for change of BATON->curr_info type.
mergeinfo_baton" only once, accounting for the change in the type
of its "curr_info" member by initializing it to an empty buffer.

author: dlr
msg: (handle_response): Rename from handler_default(), and expand doc
string to describe the implementation.  Reposition in-line comment
to better describe the code, and remove an extraneous newline.
(setup_request): Rename from setup_default(), and expand doc string
to describe the implementation.  Adjust for handle_response() API

author: ehu
msg: Start moving libsvn_ra_dav over to the pool cleanup paradigm for
cleaning up Neon resources. Improves readability. The new request structure
should help marshal errors through the neon interface.
(compressed_body_reader_cleanup): Pool cleanup for Neon compressed body
readers - non compressed readers don't need cleanup.
(xml_parser_cleanup): Pool cleanup for Neon xml parsers.
(parsed_request): Rewrite using pool cleanup registering constructors.
Now that all data is destructed on pool cleanup, use SVN_ERR for
In the old days parsed_request() did that itself, but wrapping an error
can't be a reason by itself to litter code with goto statements.

author: dlr
msg: (handler_default, setup_default): Add doc string saying which
Serf API is implemented by each function.
